name: The Glade (itch)
description:
The wizard strolls through the forest when he suddenly sees some soldiers wanting to battle. He doesn't want his precious glade to be defiled, so use his time magic to stop them!

Drag and drop soldiers to move them around. You have limited moves per level. Make sure the soldiers don't hurt anybody (not even themselves)!

Music and sound effects are from asset packs we bought on the humble store.
